otherNames: 绝世丹神, 绝世丹神 动态漫画, Peerless Alchemy,peerless pill god, Ancient Herbalist, The Ultimate Dan God
synopsis: As the spiritual energy of the Divine Enlightenment continent revives, demons are wreaking havoc and countless forces are falling apart, sweeping across the continent and leaving the human race in decline. Qin Feng, a divine alchemist who was framed and reduced to a martial arts wastrel, returns to his youth and uses the advantages of his previous life to advance his martial arts cultivation. In this life, he will not let history repeat itself, vowing to protect those he loves, eliminate all evil, and reach the top of the world as never before!
